problem_names: lemma rcm_A: "a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)"
lemma rcm_B: "((b * a) r\<rightarrow> c) = (a r\<rightarrow> (b r\<rightarrow> c))"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a r\<rightarrow> a = (1::'a)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) r\<rightarrow> a = a
lemma rcm_A: "a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)
lemma rcm_B: "((b * a) r\<rightarrow> c) = (a r\<rightarrow> (b r\<rightarrow> c))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b * a r\<rightarrow> c = a r\<rightarrow> b r\<rightarrow> c

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a \<le> b) = (a r\<rightarrow> b = (1::'a))

class right_complemented_monoid_nole_algebra = right_imp + one_times + right_inf + less_def +
  assumes right_impl_one [simp]: "a r\<rightarrow> a = 1"
  and right_impl_times: "a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)"
  and right_impl_ded: "((a * b) r\<rightarrow> c) = (b r\<rightarrow> (a r\<rightarrow> c))"

class right_complemented_monoid_algebra = right_complemented_monoid_nole_algebra +
  assumes right_lesseq: "(a \<le> b) = ((a r\<rightarrow> b) = 1)"
begin
sublocale right_complemented_monoid_algebra < dual_algebra: left_complemented_monoid_algebra "\<lambda> a b . b * a" inf "(r\<rightarrow>)" "(\<le>)" "(<)" 1

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. class.left_complemented_monoid_algebra (\<lambda>a b. b * a)
     (\<sqinter>) (r\<rightarrow>) (\<le>) (<) (1::'a)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b. a \<sqinter> b = a * (a r\<rightarrow> b)
 2. \<And>a b. a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)
 3. \<And>a b c.
       b * a r\<rightarrow> c = a r\<rightarrow> b r\<rightarrow> c
 4. \<And>a b. (a \<le> b) = (a r\<rightarrow> b = (1::'a))
by (rule inf_r_def, rule right_impl_times, rule right_impl_ded, rule right_lesseq)

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c. a * b * c = a * (b * c)
 2. \<And>a. (1::'a) * a = a
 3. \<And>a. a * (1::'a) = a
 4. \<And>a b c. a \<le> b \<Longrightarrow> c * a \<le> c * b
 5. \<And>a x b. (a * x \<le> b) = (x \<le> a r\<rightarrow> b)
 6. \<And>a b. (a \<le> b) = (\<exists>c. a = b * c)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c. a * b * c = a * (b * c)
 2. \<And>a b c. a \<le> b \<Longrightarrow> c * a \<le> c * b
 3. \<And>a x b. (a * x \<le> b) = (x \<le> a r\<rightarrow> b)
 4. \<And>a b. (a \<le> b) = (\<exists>c. a = b * c)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b c. a \<le> b \<Longrightarrow> c * a \<le> c * b
 2. \<And>a x b. (a * x \<le> b) = (x \<le> a r\<rightarrow> b)
 3. \<And>a b. (a \<le> b) = (\<exists>c. a = b * c)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a x b. (a * x \<le> b) = (x \<le> a r\<rightarrow> b)
 2. \<And>a b. (a \<le> b) = (\<exists>c. a = b * c)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b. (a \<le> b) = (\<exists>c. a = b * c)
by (unfold_locales, simp_all add: less_le_not_le rcm_A rcm_B rcm_C rcm_D)
